text:
Walking into this house was such a breath of fresh air. Ashley has created a wonderful, inviting, and charming! space. She's really thought of everything, amenities-wise, and had such a cozy spot absolutely PERFECT for 8 people. We're already talking about coming back.

The location is also wonderful, sandwiched between S 1st st full of cute restaurants and S Congress, which has a TON of shops, restaurants, etc. Both within walking distance. And definitely bikable w the bikes she has for you!!!

I would highly recommend this house for larger groups.
title: Modern, Urban Oasis for 8 SoCo/SoFi
